changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO suggestions(transaction_id, suggested_category_id, accuracy, is_correct, algorithm) SELECT t.id AS transaction_id, t.suggested_category_id, t.accuracy, CASE WHEN t.category_id = t.suggested_category_id THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_correct, 'LEVENSHTEIN' AS algorithm FROM transactions t WHERE t.suggested_category_id IS NOT NULL AND t.accuracy != 0
